    <span id="ctl00_MainContent_DetailedOutput"><h1 class="title">Xotani, The Firebleeder</h1>A monstrosity of living flame and magma, Xotani may be the weakest of Rovagug’s spawn, but it remains a formidable threat. Xotani was slain in 2104 ar by an alliance of spellcasters, but recently its deathlike slumber was interrupted. Its corpse twitches, signaling that it might be close to returning.<br /><br /><b><u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=5&General=true">Recall Knowledge - Beast</a></u> (<u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=2">Arcana</a></u>, <u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=10">Nature</a></u>)</b>: DC 50<h1 class="title"><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=491">Xotani</a><span style="float:right;">Creature 20</span></h1><a target="_blank" href="Images\Monsters\Xotani.png"><img class="thumbnail" src="Images\Monsters\Xotani.png"></a><span alt="Unique Trait" class="traitrare" title="A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=161">Unique</a></span><span alt="Chaotic Evil" class="traitalignment" title="Chaotic Evil">CE</span><span alt="Gargantuan" class="traitsize" title="Gargantuan">Gargantuan</span><span alt="Beast Trait" class="trait" title="A creature similar to an animal but with an Intelligence modifier of –3 or higher is usually a beast. Unlike an animal, a beast might be able to speak and reason."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=20">Beast</a></span><span alt="Fire Trait" class="trait" title="Effects with the fire trait deal fire damage or either conjure or manipulate fire. Those that manipulate fire have no effect in an area without fire. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of fire or have a magical connection to that element."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=72">Fire</a></span><br /><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq021cb?Pathfinder-Adventure-Path-150-Broken-Promises" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises pg. 81</i></a><br /><b>Perception</b> +39; blindsight (precise) 120 feet, darkvision<br /><b>Languages</b> <a href="Languages.aspx?ID=13"><u>Aklo</a></u>; can't speak any language<br /><b>Skills</b> <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=3"><u>Athletics</a></u> +41<br /><b>Str</b> +10, <b>Dex</b> +8, <b>Con</b> +9, <b>Int</b> -4, <b>Wis</b> +7, <b>Cha</b> +6<hr /><b>AC</b> 48, <b>Fort</b> +36, <b>Ref</b> +33, <b>Will</b> +30<br /><b>HP</b> 385 (regeneration 25); <b>Immunities</b> clumsy, disease, drained, enfeebled, fire, mental, paralyzed, petrified, poison, polymorph, stupefied; <b>Resistances</b> electricity 22, physical 22, sonic 22; <b>Weaknesses</b> cold 22<br /><b>Frightful Presence</b> (<a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=206">aura</a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=60">emotion</a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=68">fear</a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=106">mental</a>) 300 feet, DC 39<br /> <b>Light Blindness</b> Xotani’s light blindness is caused by only sunlight.<br /> <b>Reactive</b> Xotani gains 3 reactions each round. It can still use only one reaction per trigger.<br /> <b>Attack of Opportunity</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Reaction" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\Reaction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Reaction" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\Reaction_I.png"><br /> <b>Firebleed</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Reaction" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\Reaction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Reaction" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\Reaction_I.png"> (<a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=72">fire</a>) <b>Trigger</b> Xotani is damaged; <b>Effect</b> Xotani’s wound erupts with magma in a 30-foot cone, dealing 6d8 fire damage and 6d8 persistent fire damage (DC 42 basic Reflex save).<hr /><b>Speed</b> 60 feet, burrow 40 feet, climb 60 feet<br /><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> jaws +38 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 20 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 5d10+8 piercing plus 2d10 persistent fire</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> claw +38 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=170"><u>agile</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 20 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 5d8+8 slashing plus 2d8 persistent fire</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Ranged</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> lava bomb +38 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=248"><u>range increment 80 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 2d10+8 bludgeoning plus 2d10 persistent fire</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Bomb Barrage</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions_I.png">  Xotani makes three lava bomb Strikes. These Strikes can be made against the same creature or different creatures, as long as all targets are within 40 feet of each other.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Breath Weapon</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions_I.png">  (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=11"><u>arcane</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=65"><u>evocation</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=72"><u>fire</a></u>) Xotani breathes a blast of flame that deals 18d6 fire damage plus 4d6 persistent fire damage to all creatures in a 70-foot cone (DC 42 basic Reflex save). It can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Swallow Whole</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png">  (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=15"><u>attack</a></u>) Huge, 8d6+8 bludgeoning plus 12d6 fire, Rupture 35</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Trample</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Three Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\ThreeActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Three Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\ThreeActions_I.png">  Huge or smaller, claw, DC 42. When Xotani Tramples, it can Stride up to triple its Speed.</span><h2 class="title">All Monsters in "<a href="MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=115">Spawn of Rovagug</a>"</h2><table class="inner"><tr><td><b>Name</b></td><td><b>Level</b></td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=490">Tarrasque, The Armageddon Engine</a></td><td>25</td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=491">Xotani, The Firebleeder</a></td><td>20</td></tr></table><h1 class="title"><a href="MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=115">Spawn of Rovagug</a></h1><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq021cb?Pathfinder-Adventure-Path-150-Broken-Promises" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises pg. 80</i></a><br />The spawn are titanic terrors of immense size and strength that live only to destroy. Tarrasque and Xotani are but two of Rovagug’s spawn. Others, including Chemnosit (the Monarch Worm), Kothogaz (the Dance of Disharmony), and Volnagur (the End-Singer) hold places of horror in the history of various regions, but the most famed is Ulunat (the Unholy First), whose beetle-like carcass remains sprawled in Sothis, the capital of Osirion.<h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Advice and Rules" title="Sidebar - Advice and Rules" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_1_AdviceAndRules.png"> Hibernating Spawn</h3>All spawn of Rovagug can sleep for centuries and do not need to eat, drink, or even breathe while hibernating. While hibernating, a spawn’s resistances double in value. It cannot be located by divination effects, and for any saving throw, it uses the outcome for one degree of success better than the result.<h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Advice and Rules" title="Sidebar - Advice and Rules" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_1_AdviceAndRules.png"> Slaying Spawn</h3>A spawn of Rovagug has regeneration powerful enough to revive it even if slain by a death effect. If the spawn fails a save against an effect that would kill it instantly, it rises from death 3 rounds later with 1 Hit Point. It can be banished, imprisoned, or transported away as a means to save a region, or kept in a state of dying by an effect that deals constant damage. A complex and expensive ritual culminating in a word that douses Xotani’s flames can be used to deactivate its regeneration, but no method of deactivating Tarrasque’s regeneration has yet been discovered.</span>

	</div>

  <script>
      initiateToggle(document.getElementById('theme-toggle'));
      initializeMenuToggle(document.getElementById('minMaxMenu'));
      var initializeSearch = function (search) {
          var button;
          var text;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.lastElementChild;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.lastElementChild;

          if (search) {
              search.addEventListener('keypress', function (e) {
                  if (e.keyCode == 13) {
                      e.preventDefault();
                      if (text.value != null && text.value.length > 0)
                          window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
                  }
              })
          }
          if (button) {
              button.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                  window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
              });
          }
      };
      var initializeExpand = function (toggle) {
          var targetAttrString = "[data-target='" + toggle.dataset.toggle + "']";
          //target = menu to be collapsed
          var target = document.querySelector(targetAttrString);
          toggle.addEventListener('click', function () {
              var expanded = target.classList.contains('expanded');
              expanded = !expanded;
              if (expanded) {
                  //hide other in group if exists
                  if (target.dataset.group) {
                      var otherExpanded = document.querySelector('.expanded[data-group="' + target.dataset.group + '"]');
                      if (otherExpanded) {
                          otherExpanded.classList.remove('expanded');
                      }
                  }
                  target.classList.add('expanded');
              } else {
                  target.classList.remove('expanded');
              }
          });
      };
      (function () {
          //toggles = link that expands/collapses target
          var toggles = document.querySelectorAll('[data-toggle]');
          toggles.forEach(function (toggle) {
              initializeExpand(toggle);
          });
          //searches
          var searches = document.querySelectorAll('.search');
          searches.forEach(function (search) {
              initializeSearch(search);
          });
      })();
  </script>
</body>
</html>
